title: 211. Matthew Reilly: Two Lost Mountains (with Dani Vee & Adrian Beck)
itunes:author: Words and Nerds: Authors, books and literature.
itunes:summary: Best selling author Matthew Reilly joins the Words and Nerds Podcast to cha about his number one book in Australia The Two Lost Mountains. We have a brilliant chat about the writing process, possible sequels, killing characters, Game of Thrones, Hollywood and an insight into Jack West Jnr. Author Jack Heath drops in for a cameo.
